response.overview: Join in on the journey of four exceptionally talented musicians as they travel on a collision course to create a musical group called Hillsburn. The cameras roll from the moment of their first jam and follow through a series of attention gathering concerts, leading to the recording and release of their first album. Is Hillsburn the musical destiny each member was waiting for? What does it take for a group of talented musicians to make music their full-time career?
response.title: Hillsburn: A Band Becomes
